features: RADIANT FLAWLESS FINISH - Body Blur is the original and best-selling body makeup, loved by makeup artists across the globe. An instant and wash off skin perfector that delivers a flawless, glowing look with light-reflecting particles. Apply using The Vita Liberata Tanning Mitt to ensure a flawless finish with its perfect density, texture, and shape for smooth, streak-free results.

WHAT IT DOES - The Body Blur & Brush combo gives skin a glowing finish, disguises imperfections, and blends easily. The medium shade offers a medium latte bronze colour that dries quickly and can be washed off anytime. The tanning mitt has been designed to effortlessly glide over the skin delivering an even finish. It makes light work of hard-to-tan areas such as hands and feet, resulting in a perfect application every time.

WHO IT IS FOR - This bundle is perfect for anyone who wants a quick, instant, easy to apply and effortless glow. Body Blur Medium is designed for anyone who wants to celebrate their medium skin tone or anyone who wants to darken their pale skin to a more bronze tone. Paired with the tanning mitt for a flawless and streak-free application, it is great for expert tanners or beginners, and protects palms for a stain-free finish.

HOW TO USE - Apply a grape sized amount onto the brush and blend in circular motions for a flawless finish. Use sparingly on the décolleté, hands, and feet for the most natural looking result. Its wash-off formula offers flexibility with no commitment, making it the perfect customisable body makeup and skin perfector.

VITA LIBERATA - Utilising advanced technology to significantly reduce the typical self-tanner scent and hydrate for 72 hours with certified organic ingredients. With formulas crafted from organic, skin-loving ingredients and free from harsh chemicals like parabens and sulphates, providing a healthier tanning experience. Revoluitionise your tanning routine and take care of your skin, all in one with Vita Liberata. Enjoy a flawless, sun-kissed glow that fades evenly—no sun damage required.
description: Product Description Body Blur is a widely-loved product by makeup artists everywhere. It's the best-selling body makeup and skin finish that delivers a flawless, glowing look with its light-reflecting formula. Accompanied with a tanning mitt that has been designed to effortlessly glide over the skin delivering an even finish. It makes light work of hard-to-tan areas such as hands and feet, resulting in a perfect application every time. Directions Apply a grape sized amount onto the brush and blend in circular motions for a flawless finish. Use sparingly on the décolleté, hands, and feet for the most natural looking result. The brush can also be used to contour for added definition. Safety Warning External use only See more
